HDG.IM.content: Nietzsche: highest concepts, Being, final wisp of evaporating reality [Twilight of the Idols]
HDG.IM.linkedContent: Nietzsche: highest concepts, Being, final wisp of evaporating reality [Twilight of the Idols]

HDG.IM.content: [method contra Nietzsche] unfolding that which was realized through Nietzsche by truly engaged attack on him > is Nietzsche final victim of fall out of Being? witness to a new necessity?
HDG.IM.linkedContent: [method contra Nietzsche] unfolding that which was realized through Nietzsche by truly engaged attack on him > is Nietzsche final victim of fall out of Being? witness to a new necessity?

HDG.QB.content: nihilism consummated when seizes all subsisting resources, when nothing can assert itself as an exception anymore [oblivion of Being]: condition of normality a consequence of consummation (Vollendung) > essence of nihilism prevails in advance [destiny] of nihilistic phenomena, consummation not nihilism’s end: w/ consummation first begins final phase of nihilism
HDG.QB.linkedContent: nihilism consummated when seizes all subsisting resources, when nothing can assert itself as an exception anymore [oblivion of Being]: condition of normality a consequence of consummation (Vollendung) > essence of nihilism prevails in advance [destiny] of nihilistic phenomena, consummation not nihilism’s end: w/ consummation first begins final phase of nihilism

HDG.FS.content: final moment of Absolute in Hegel, contraction, cum-trahere, drawing-together (zusammen-ziehen) of all opposites to highest unity of Absolute [condensation?]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: final moment of Absolute in Hegel, contraction, cum-trahere, drawing-together (zusammen-ziehen) of all opposites to highest unity of Absolute [condensation?]

HDG.OHF.content: “toward the objective,” “Platonism of barbarians” [reference to Republic], objective metaphysics: what kind of being stands in forehaving here? Vorhandensein, Gegenwärtigsein, the present transformation of culture > “Vorhaben, Vorgriff: bestimmen = übersehbar machen” [this final sentence seems to show that there is showing in defining limitations of today]
